TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 羊须草 ( 原变种) yang xu cao (yuan bian zhong)

TaxonIdentification.species_authority: Leysser f. callitrichos (V. I. Kreczetowicz) T. Koyama

treatment.description: Male spike few flowered; male glumes acute at apex; female spike 1–3-flowered.
treatment.distribution: Pinus forests; 800–1000 m. Heilongjiang [Japan, Korea, Russia (Far East)].
